Fields in info.ephyra.answerselection with type parameters of type Filter

          The Filters that are applied to the Results.

Uses of Filter in info.ephyra.answerselection.filters
 

Subclasses of Filter in info.ephyra.answerselection.filters
 class AdaptiveNumberOfKeywordsFilter
          An adaptive version of the NumberOfKeywordsFilter that also takes occurrences of keywords in preceding text snippets into account.
 class AnswerPatternFilter
          The AnswerPatternFilter uses answer patterns to extract factoid answers from text passages and to rank them.
 class AnswerProjectionFilter
          The AnswerProjectionFilter projects answers from the Web onto a corpus.
 class AnswerTypeFilter
          The AnswerTypeFilter extracts factoid answers of the expected answer types from text passages.
 class CacheResultsFilter
          Caches the results along with the query string of the first result.
 class CombineScoresFilter
          Combines the extra scores of each Result and sets the main score to their sum.
 class CutKeywordsFilter
          Trims answer candidates for definitional questions to improve the precision by chopping of leading news agency acronyms and cities.
 class CutStatementProviderFilter
          Trims answer candidates for definitional questions to improve the precision by chopping of leading introductions of indirect speech.
 class DeserializationFilter
          The DeserializationFilter reads serialized results from one or more files.
 class DirectSpeechFilter
          Drops answer candidates for definitional questions that consist of direct speech.
 class DuplicateFilter
          The DuplicateFilter drops duplicate results.
 class DuplicateSnippetFilter
          A variant of the DuplicateFilter for answer candidates that are text snippets.
 class FactoidsFromPredicatesFilter
          The FactoidsFromPredicatesFilter extracts factoid answers from predicate-argument structures.
 class FactoidSubsetFilter
          The FactoidSubsetFilter checks a set of factoid answers for subset relations.
 class FunctionWordsFilter
          A filter that drops a result if the answer string contains only function words.
 class GoogleTermImportanceFilter
          A web term importance filter that counts term frequencies in text snippets retrieved with the Google search engine.
 class HitPositionFilter
          Scores the results according to their hit positions.
 class HitPositionSorterFilter
          The HitPositionSorterFilter sorts the results by their hit positions in ascending order.
 class NormalizedScoreSorterFilter
          The NormalizedScoreSorterFilter sorts the results by their normalized scores in descending order.
 class NounPhraseFilter
          Scores answer candidates for definitional questions according to the number of novel noun phrases they contain.
 class NuggetEvaluationFilter
          Automatically evaluates answer candidates for the 'other' questions in TREC 13-16.
 class NumberOfKeywordsFilter
          Filters results by the number of keywords.
 class OverlapAnalysisFilter
          Generates overlap analyses for different answer extraction strategies.
 class PredicateExtractionFilter
          Extracts predicates which are similar to those in the question from documents.
 class PreferNamedEntitiesFilter
          The PreferNamedEntitiesFilter prefers factoid answers that are named entities over other factoid answers.
 class ProperNameFilter
          Drops answer candidates for definitional questions that are enumerations of proper names.
 class QueryScoreFilter
          This filter simply increments the score of each result by the score of the query that was used to obtain the result.
 class QuestionKeywordsFilter
          A filter that drops a result if the answer string contains a keyword from the question.
 class ResultLengthFilter
          A filter that cuts off results if the total length of non-whitespace characters exceeds a threshold.
 class ResultLengthSorterFilter
          The ResultLengthSorterFilter sorts the results by the lengths of the answer strings in ascending order.
 class ReverseScoreSorterFilter
          The ReverseScoreSorterFilter sorts the results by their scores in ascending order.
 class ScoreCombinationFilter
          The ScoreCombinationFilter combines the normalized scores of an answer extracted with several techniques into a single score.
 class ScoreNormalizationFilter
          A filter that normalizes the scores of the answer candidates by applying a trained classifier.
 class ScoreResetterFilter
          Filter setting the score of each result to 0.
 class ScoreSorterFilter
          The ScoreSorterFilter sorts the results by their scores in descending order.
 class SentenceExtractionFilter
          Splits the answer strings of results that are not from knowledge annotators into sentences and creates a new result for each sentence.
 class SentenceSplitterFilter
          Splits text snippets into sentences in order to facilitate the detection of redundant information.
 class SerializationFilter
          The SerializationFilter serializes the results and writes them to a file.
 class StopwordFilter
          A filter that drops a result if the answer string contains only function words and single characters (except digits) contains an interrogative contains a single bracket or quotation mark is an adverb
 class SubclauseSplitterFilter
          Splits sentences into subclauses in order to facilitate the detection of redundant information.
 class TermFilter
          Drops answer candidates for the 'other' questions in TREC 13-16 that contain answers to previous factoid or list questions.
 class TermImportanceFilter
          Prefers answer candidates for definitional questions that contain common keywords.
 class TripletFilter
          Scores answer candidates for definitional questions according to the number of novel NP-VP-NP triplets they contain.
 class TruncationFilter
          A filter that truncates the answer strings.
 class UnnecessaryCharactersFilter
          Drops unnecessary characters from answer candidates for definitional questions to improve precision.
 class WebDocumentFetcherFilter
          A filter that fetches web documents that contain the given search engine snippets.
 class WebTermImportanceFilter
          A web reinforcement approach that ranks answer candidates for definitional questions.
private static class WebTermImportanceFilter.TargetGeneratorTest
           
 class WikipediaGoogleTermImportanceFilter
          A web term importance filter that counts term frequencies in a Wikipedia article on the target of the question.
 class WikipediaTermImportanceFilter
          A web term importance filter that counts term frequencies in a Wikipedia article on the target of the question.
 class YahooTermImportanceFilter
          A web term importance filter that counts term frequencies in text snippets retrieved with the Yahoo search engine.
 

Uses of Filter in info.ephyra.io
 

Methods in info.ephyra.io with parameters of type Filter
static void MsgPrinter.printFilterFinished(Filter filter, int resCount)
          Prints out the status message that a filter has finished its work in the answer selection phase, plus the number of remaining results.
static void MsgPrinter.printFilterStarted(Filter filter, int resCount)
          Prints out the status message that a filter has started its work in the answer selection phase, plus the number of results passed to the filter.
